title: Disadvantage

ou roll a second D20 when you make the roll. The game will use the lower of the two rolls to decide the outcome. For example, if you roll a 17 and a 5, the game will use the 5 to decide the outcome of the roll and the 17 will be discarded.

Disadvantage is one of the worst situations you can be on when rolling on Baldur's Gate 3 and on any D&D game, as it halves your chance of success and should be avoided in all situations.
